issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hello,

My application work on Titanium Mobile SDK 1.7.3 normally(Simulator and Ipad Devices). When update the Titanium Mobile SDK 1.8.0.1 RC3, it did not work on devices(but work on simulator).
Reproceduce:
1. Updating Titanium Mobile SDK 1.8.0.1 RC3
2. Distribute run test on device
3. Install to IPAD 1(OR IPAD 2)
Result:
- My application's crashed immediately when it start. I don't now!

Could anyone help me,please.  

Thanks so much!
fields.summary: Mobile SDK 1.8.0.1 RC3 issue: The application crashed on IPAD 2 & IPAD 1 when application start but it work on simulator normally.
fields.environment:
OS: MAC OSX 10.6.8
Xcode: 4.2
Titanium Developer IDE.
Titanium Mobile SDK 1.8.0.1 RC3.
Simulator iOS: 4.2
IPAD 1 device: iOS 4.1
IPAD 2 device: iOS 5.1

comments.body: Thank you everybody, I've just fix this problem as i updated the XCode SDK 4.2 & update iOs SDK 5

hi,

I also have same problem..when I start basic 'Hello World' on ipad it crashed immediately but runs properly on simulator..

I am currently using titanium 1.8.2 , XCode 4.2 and iOs sdk 5..

what should I do?

thanks..

Amol,
Can you paste the sample and log files here?
Thanks,

Hello,

I can't reproduce this with an ipad 2, iOS 5 and Mobile SDK 1.8.2 

Best,

Mauro
